source_objects.title: Pet Care & Training
source_objects.description: Learn the best kept secrets in pet care and pet training: dogs, cats, rabbits, horses, fish and many more.

items.title: Cat Behavior Rectification & Cat Health Care: 2 courses in 1

visible_instructors.name: Aman
visible_instructors.job_title: UX Expert, Pet Lover  & Technology Enthusiast
visible_instructors.title: Aman Gupta

items.headline: 1.  Common Cat Behavior Issues and training methods to rectify them    2. Tips for better healthcare of your cat.
objectives_summary: Various common behavior problems in cats like scratching, excessive vocalization, attention seeking, OCD, separation anxiety, urine marking, inter-cat aggression in multiple cat household, play aggression, redirected aggression, petting induced aggression, fear, spilling water and others
Possible reasons behind these behavior issues exhibited by cats
Potential solutions to correct these behavior issues in cats

visible_instructors.job_title: Dog Expert & Trainer at Curious Puppies
visible_instructors.title: Berry Van Loenen

items.headline: The Complete Dog Obedience Training Course To A Fantastic Life With Your Dog.
objectives_summary: Determine if owning a dog is the right thing for your family
Choose the right dog for your family
Enjoy a much more peaceful life with your dog

items.title: Dog & Cat Behavior Problems

visible_instructors.name: Ian
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert dog trainer, veterinarian and animal behaviorist
visible_instructors.title: Ian Dunbar

items.headline: Learn the essential training techniques you'll need to raise a pet dog or cat and fix common behavior problems.
objectives_summary: Prevent and fix the most common cat and dog behavior problems.
Litter box train a cat and house train a dog.
Prevent your pet from destroying your home and belongings.

items.title: Dog Training - Stop Dog Barking  - Easy Dog Training Methods

visible_instructors.name: Sharon
visible_instructors.job_title: Dog and Puppy Expert, Specialist in NLP & Law of Attraction
visible_instructors.title: Sharon Bolt

items.headline: Learn gentle dog training methods that get your dog to take notice of you and to stop barking on command.
objectives_summary: How to stop your dog from barking at the front door or window by using a command.
How to gently stop your dog barking in the back yard when you say.
Why the postman/mailman makes dog barking so much worse and how to have a calm and happy dog when the mail is delivered.

items.title: Dog Training - Puppies - A-Z Guide To Puppy & Dog Training

visible_instructors.title: Sharon Bolt

items.headline: Learn dog training methods that train puppies quickly. Learn puppy training techniques that get it right from the start
objectives_summary: What to look for when choosing a good breeder.
How to recognize the characteristics to look for when choosing the right puppy for you.
What to do before bringing your puppy home.

items.title: Speak the Horse Language: Master Your Horsemanship Energy

visible_instructors.title: Krystal Kelly

items.headline: How to use energy body language to communicate with your horse! Horse riding & Horsemanship Course | Equine Pet training
objectives_summary: How to communicate with horses in THEIR language
How to master your body language and your energy to effectively communicate with your horse
Groundwork games and exercises

items.title: Dog Training - Leash Training - Simple Dog Training Methods

visible_instructors.name: Sharon
visible_instructors.job_title: Dog and Puppy Expert, Specialist in NLP & Law of Attraction
visible_instructors.title: Sharon Bolt

items.headline: Learn gentle dog training methods that get your dog to want to walk by your side and come back when called off leash
objectives_summary: What the walk really means to a dog and why it’s vital that you get this area right.
Easy and very successful techniques you can do before you leave the house that makes a remarkable difference to your walk.
Calm, kind and confident methods you can do during the walk, when your dog pulls, that will give them the message they need to walk calmly by your side.

items.title: Fun Nose work Games for Pet Dogs
items.headline: Discover how to unlock the power of your dog's amazing nose by playing find it games using food and toys.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course students will be able to connect and bond with your dog by using his nose
Give your dog an outlet for their amazing sense of smell, most dogs noses just get them into trouble, not any more...
Teach your dog how to find your keys, mobile phone, handbag or TV remote!

items.title: Dog Massage Training Course
items.headline: Learn how to massage your dog
objectives_summary: Obtain the knowledge and confidence needed in order to be your dog’s masseur.
Perform dog massage methods that are easy to do and get quick results by yourself.
Basic differences between human and dog massage.

items.title: Learn how to groom your dog at home!
items.headline: Learn how to groom your dog from start to finish including bathing, brushing, health & safety, and styling
objectives_summary: You will have the confidence and knowledge to groom your dog at home from head to toe - you will learn which tools are best for you, how to keep everyone safe, and how to make the process enjoyable for the dog and you!

items.title: Dog Training - Stop Dog Attacks - Easy Dog Training Methods

visible_instructors.title: Sharon Bolt

items.headline: Learn dog training methods that integrate dogs who are dog aggressive, learn the 'warning' signs and prevent dog attacks
objectives_summary: Simple methods that integrate dogs who are aggressive with other dogs.
How to recognize dominant and submissive signals that prevent dog attacks from happening.
How to understand the 3 different types of dog aggression.

items.title: Professional Dog Walker Training Course
items.headline: How to enjoy safe and stimulating group walks
objectives_summary: At the end of this course dog walkers will have a blueprint to follow that will enable them to keep great control of their dogs on AND off lead.

items.title: WOLVES The DOG Ancestors - Learning Animals Nature Dog Human
items.headline: WOLVES and Dog, Human, Animals, Nature, Dog Behavior, Spirituality, Conservation, Dog Human Evolution, Dog Training
objectives_summary: UNDERSTANDING WOLVES from different perspectives.
ANIMAL SENTIENCE: non-human animals feel, think, and articulate emotional, social, and moral life.
The ESSENTIAL ROLE of Wolves (and other predators) as ECOSYSTEM "Regulators".

items.title: Dog Training for Humans - Stop Pulling on the Lead!
items.headline: The ultimate loose leash dog walking course - Discover the 3 step strategy to stop your dog pulling on the lead.
objectives_summary: Calmly and confidently walk your dog on lead, with much more control too.
More easily get your dog's attention so you can successfully walk your dog on leash, even in built up areas where he is asually distracted.

items.headline: Learn how to feed your dog the way nature intended and get a lean, fit and healthy dog. Makes dog training much easier!
objectives_summary: What raw feeding is and why it's so beneficial to dogs.
How to switch feeding your dog from conventional feeding to raw feeding.
How much to feed your dog daily.
